Nope. Just set up two project root directories (an additional sourcepath
en=
try) e.g. src & test.
Say I have a file toplevel.nextlevel.MyClass, the pro=
duction source would be
in src/toplevel/nextlevel/MyClass.java and the test=
 source would be in
test/toplevel/nextlevel/TestMyClass.java

Covered in th=
e faq for Junit.

Hope this helps.
